item.title: Unbelievable Trick: Update Your iPhone 5 to iOS 11 Without a Computer!
item.description: Introduction Are you an iPhone 5 user who is looking for an easy and fast way to update your device to iOS 11? If so, then you’ll be excited to know that there is an unbelievable trick that lets you update your iPhone 5 to iOS 11 without a computer! Steps to Update iPhone 5 to iOS 11 Without a Computer Updating your iPhone 5 to iOS 11 without a computer is actually quite simple.
